content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content:
Greetings, Ms. Wang. While I appreciate your interest in our apartment in Munich, let's focus solely on discussing the rental price during this negotiation. To begin with, I have a high expectation for this prime location and the apartment's features.

As we move forward in our conversation, please remember that should you find a price satisfactory to you, you can express your agreement using the phrase, 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' If you wish to stop the negotiation for any reason, respond with 'I don't want to continue the negotiation, because [reason].' Once a price is agreed upon or we decide to end the negotiation without reaching an accord, say 'TERMINATE.'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
